name: Blending In
description:
Blending In

I made this game in 3 hours for the Trijam#123 game jam. The theme was "Hide or get caught".

(This game is semi-NSFW. There is a shirtless man running around with a censored lower half)

Play as a man streaking at a football game and running away from security. The fans have thrown articles of clothing onto the field for you to put on and blend in with the crowd.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Pickup the articles of clothing to match the outfit in the top left corner. Once you reach the end-zone, run into the crowd to hide. If you match the outfit perfectly, you get away successfully. Don't get it right and you're under arrest!
